t:
We started ‘Project Cleanup’ to clear the space debris from the satellite orbits to prevent damage to the satellites.



It's been successful. We've found detached solar panels, pieces of satellites, human bones, several equipments etc.
c:
Among these everything except the bones are useless.



Read, slowly, if you couldn't find the horror/twist.





#satellite #spacedebris #cleanup #scifi #human #bones #orbit #horror
